statements: SELECT * FROM ContentTrends
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM ContentTrends WHERE audience_age_group = '18-25'
SELECT content_id, content_title, view_count FROM ContentTrends ORDER BY view_count DESC
SELECT content_id, content_title, engagement_rate FROM ContentTrends WHERE audience_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT content_id, content_title, audience_location FROM ContentTrends WHERE audience_location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT content_title, view_count FROM ContentTrends WHERE content_type = 'Article' ORDER BY view_count DESC;
SELECT audience_age_group, audience_gender, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement_rate FROM ContentTrends GROUP BY audience_age_group, audience_gender;
SELECT content_title, content_type, audience_age_group, view_count FROM ContentTrends WHERE audience_age_group IN ('18-24', '25-34') ORDER BY view_count ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT audience_location FROM ContentTrends WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT content_type, SUM(view_count) AS total_views FROM ContentTrends GROUP BY content_type HAVING SUM(view_count) > 1000 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_trends WHERE views > 100 ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, category FROM content_trends WHERE likes > 50 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM audience_preferences WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT title, views, likes FROM content_trends WHERE category = 'Technology' AND views > 500 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM audience_preferences WHERE interests LIKE '%Cooking%'
SELECT * FROM content_trends ORDER BY publish_date DESC, views ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_id, title, category FROM content_trends WHERE likes > 100 AND shares > 50;
SELECT title, category, publish_date FROM content_trends WHERE category = 'Technology' AND views < 500 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM audience_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 AND location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, age, interests, favorite_content_id FROM audience_preferences WHERE interests LIKE '%Music%' OR interests LIKE '%Movies%' ORDER BY age DESC, favorite_content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Content_Trends WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, publishing_date, views FROM Content_Trends WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT content_title, likes FROM Content_Trends WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT content_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM Content_Trends GROUP BY content_type;
SELECT content_title, publishing_date FROM Content_Trends WHERE publishing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publishing_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT content_title, content_type, publishing_date, views FROM Content_Trends WHERE content_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM Audience_Preferences WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT content_title, publishing_date, likes FROM Content_Trends WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT content_id, COUNT(analytics_id) AS total_analytics FROM Content_Analytics GROUP BY content_id HAVING COUNT(analytics_id) > 5;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location, interests FROM Audience_Preferences WHERE age > 18 AND interests LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY age ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM ContentPosts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_content, feedback_text FROM ContentPosts JOIN AudienceFeedback ON ContentPosts.post_id = AudienceFeedback.post_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT post_id, views_count, engagement_rate FROM ContentAnalytics ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM ContentPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_title, likes_count FROM ContentPosts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;

SELECT post_title, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM ContentPosts JOIN AudienceFeedback ON ContentPosts.post_id = AudienceFeedback.post_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT post_id, views_count, engagement_rate, click_through_rate FROM ContentAnalytics ORDER BY views_count DESC, engagement_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT id, topic, average_rating FROM trend_analysis WHERE total_views > 10000;
SELECT topic, total_views, average_rating FROM trend_analysis WHERE average_rating >= 4.0 AND total_views < 5000;
SELECT * FROM audience_preferences WHERE likes > dislikes ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, content_type, likes, dislikes FROM audience_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY total_views ASC, average_rating DESC;
SELECT topic, total_views, average_rating FROM trend_analysis WHERE total_views > 1000 AND average_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT id, content_type, likes, dislikes FROM audience_preferences WHERE likes > dislikes ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT data_source, mining_algorithm, processing_time FROM data_mining WHERE processing_time < 50 AND results LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT strategy_id, content_type, recommendations, implementation_cost FROM content_strategy WHERE implementation_cost <= 5000 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
